    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoardGUI

        public GameBoardGUI(int mapNumber,
                    java.util.ArrayList<PlayerBoardView> allBoards,
                    PlayerBoardView ownerBoard,
                    CellView[][] boardMatrix)
        this builds the main window of the gameplay
        Parameters:
        mapNumber - is the number of the map chosen
        allBoards - is the set of all the playerboards of the player of the game
        ownerBoard - is the player board of the current user (subject who's running the Adrenaline Client)
        boardMatrix - is the board matrix of the current game

    • Method Detail

      • setFrenzy

        public void setFrenzy(java.util.ArrayList<PlayerBoardView> allBoards,
                      PlayerBoardView ownerBoard)
        this method set the frenzy mode on the gui layout
        Parameters:
        allBoards - arraylist with the all boards
        ownerBoard - BoardView with the info about the owner player's board

      • updateBoardGame

        public void updateBoardGame(java.util.ArrayList<PlayerBoardView> allBoards,
                            PlayerBoardView ownerBoard,
                            CellView[][] boardMatrix,
                            KillShotTrackerView kills,
                            PlayerHandView ownerHand)
        This method updates the board with new information
        Parameters:
        allBoards - is the set of all the playerboards of the player of the game
        ownerBoard - is the player board of the current user (subject who's running the Adrenaline Client)
        boardMatrix - is the board matrix of the current game
        kills - is the killshot track
        ownerHand - is the hand of the current user, containing its cards (guns and powerups)
